wikipedia_page.main: Lee Andrew Tuck (born 30 June 1988) is an English professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Malaysia Super League club  Terengganu, on loan from Sri Pahang. Since leaving the English non-league in 2010, Tuck has spent most of his professional career in South East Asia, playing in the top-flight leagues of Thailand, Bangladesh and Malaysia.

response: Arambagh finished at sixth position in 2016 Bangladesh Football Premier League which is their best performance after 2009–10 Bangladesh League. They also played the final of Bangladesh Federation Cup after 15 long years where they lost the game to Dhaka Abahani by Lee Tuck's solitary goal.
